ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m curious, how is it that you can go on the Vox raids when you are beyond the 52 cap?  Do you hang back and sing mana song for casters, and/or buffs? I guess
ygData.messageBody:
I'm curious, how is it that you can go on the Vox raids when you are beyond
the 52 cap? Do you hang back and sing mana song for casters, and/or buffs?

I guess I don't really fully understand how a character is prevented from
doing Vox and Naggy after level 52, I haven't figured out how Verant
implemented that restriction.

-Faras
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 1:30 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?


I went on MANY vox raids for other bards white scales. Its certainyl
acceptable on Veeshan. I just began to hate them (the Vox Raids) so much
that I swore them off...

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
